info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:22AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Perry and northern Franklin Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 422 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sesser, or near Christopher, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rend Lake Area around 430 AM CDT. Christopher around 435 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Benton and West City. This includes Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 71 and 78. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
